title: Fantastic Beasts 2 Trailer Reacts - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 03.13.18
description:
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Nick and Andy (and Cool Greg) talk about the new trailer for Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Nicholas Cage as Superman, 15 Second of Sports, and which video game should Nick master.

Time Codes - 
-New fantastic beasts trailer (23:01 mins)
-The irishman could be scorseses most expensive film yet (32:28 mins)
-Margot Robbie now in negotiations to play sharon ate in quentin tarantino film (35:36 mins)
-Nicolas Cage will finally play superman (36:19 mins)

Thanks to https://www.twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps! (

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
